entry.data:
CLEAR, COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 11
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 30
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS 15 TO 20
LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
